definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]

sentences.english: The bread can be fresh or stale and crusts can be left on or removed.
sentences.chinese: 面包可新鲜或陈旧的和结壳可以留在或删除。

sentences.english: Central Pacific seamounts are mainly distribution areas of Co-rich crusts.
sentences.chinese: 中太平洋海区是富钴结壳的主要分布区。

sentences.english: The method has been applied to multi element analysis in Co rich crusts from the Pacific Ocean.
sentences.chinese: 已应用于太平洋富钴结壳中多元素分析。

sentences.english: The concentrations of usable elements in the Co-rich crusts have been changed by phosphatization.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸盐化导致富钴结壳成矿元素含量发生改变。

sentences.english: Phosphorites are the main components in the old layers of the Co-rich crusts.
sentences.chinese: 磷酸盐岩是富钴结壳老壳层的主要组分之一。

sentences.english: The flotation technology of cored and gravel cobalt-rich crust from the Pacific Ocean is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究结核状及砾状大洋富钴结壳浮选工艺。

sentences.english: Main achievements and recent developments in isotopic dating of Fe-Mn crusts are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 同位素法测年是大洋铁锰结壳测年的主要方法。

definition: to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)
to form a scar/to form a scab
(of a sore etc) to fester/to ulcerate
